name: risk_weight
question: How risk afine are you? Consider the following situation: A lottery ticket kiosk at a funfair offers 5 types of € 1 tickets, with varing rewards and chances to win. Which type of ticket would you choose?

options.label: 100% chance of winning a prize of € 1
80% chance of winning a prize of € 1.25
50% chance of winning a prize of € 2

name: esg_weight
question: How sustainability afine are you? Assume an forward auction (like on ebay) to buy a portfolio with better net impact ratio (net impact on society, knowledge, health, environment as defined by Upright Project https://netimpactreport.com/chapter-2). Only the bidder with the highest bid will win. Your overall portfolio budget is € 10.000. By how much would you decrease your investment to bid at the auction?

options.label: By 1 € for additional 10% net impact ratio points
By 10 € for additional 1% net impact ratio points
By 100 € for additional 0,1% net impact ratio points
By 1000 € for additional 0,01% net impact ratio points
